website_summaries.verdict: Small putting aid that helps you visualize the high side of the hole for more success with dropping putts.
pros: If you have trouble visualizing lines to the hole, this trainer helps you aim at the section of the hole for the best chance of making the putt
Trainer fits in a pocket so it can be used easily on the putting green
Perfectly fits around any standard golf hole
cons: Not designed to help you develop a more consistent putting stroke

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research and finally chose this one. First it is the same size as the real golf hole, the opening is narrow but it is the most like the realy hole. It will difinatley help to improve the putting skill. Second it is solid and heavy, you can put three balls in and the balls will stay in the hole very nicely. Highly recommed!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality product
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of different putting training aids, and I decided on this one based on the reviews. It really is a nice quality product. I had been putting into a plastic cup, which constantly moved and had to be adjusted for each putt. This product is solid. Its weight prevents it from moving when you hit your putts. I use it on a carpet with 3 golf balls. Great for indoor practice. Haven't tried it on the green yet.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Nicer and heavier than I had expected. Quality.
customer_reviews.text: As you can see, they are easy to use. Surprised how heavy they are, which is good because they don’t move. Just really simple, but really solid.
customer_reviews.author: T. OHagan

customer_reviews.title: Great Training Aid
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot. Good tool for practicing straight putts on a mat or carpet. Solid and stays in place. Slightly smaller opening than the standard hole for focus on center cup putts. Have not tried it on a real practice green, but like that I could (it separates and allows for placement of the top piece into a hole). Or you can take it and use it by itself on a busy practice green without tying up a hole.
customer_reviews.author: JCH

customer_reviews.title: Great Training Aid
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It arrived on time and well packaged. I use it at home to practice my 3 & 4 footers on the carpet for twenty minutes while watching the evening news, daily. Since it is above ground it helps with my depth perception and focus on that narrow opening. On the course I visualize that narrow opening and bang. My 4 footers have really improved. I am going to buy another one for my golf bag.
customer_reviews.author: gmw5555

customer_reviews.title: A great golf aid for your improving your putting!
customer_reviews.text: The SKLZ Putt Pocket is a great golf aid for practicing your putting! It can be used in various ways and on different surfaces when a regular golf practice green is not available. It really helps your putting accuracy, which will help you lower your score by reducing your number of two and/or three putts! You can't go wrong with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: It's a good practice device but the opening is not as wide as a golf hole.
customer_reviews.text: Like the device overall, especially the fact that you can take it apart and make 2 targets. Dislike the fact that the opening is only 2 3/4" wide while a golf hole is 4 1/4" wide. Dumb!!!!!!! Make the opening on the device as wide as a golf hole.
customer_reviews.author: ken robinson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for to practice putting in my small apartment. It's a super simple design, but does the job. I had recently discovered that I had a drink coaster that was the diameter of a golf hole, but there was no way to keep the balls from going all over the place. This stops the balls, and you can hit 3-4 in there at a time. Even when you miss, the edges will stop the ball near the device. The weight is also nice in keeping it from sliding around. Perfect for very small spaces!
customer_reviews.author: Cody M. Burkhardt

customer_reviews.title: Practice your putting anywhere!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a simple concept but is so effective in its delivery. I can practice my putting anywhere. This is better than using a coffee cup or buying a more expensive turf putting surface. Great price and will make a great gift for that “golfer” in your life, especially if it’s you!
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: I've found this really helpful for honing in my putting ...
customer_reviews.text: I've found this really helpful for honing in my putting sills. I use it primarily indoors with the Grass Roots indoor putting green and it really takes it to the next level. I've seen the benefit with my accuracy on the course, especially with the pesky 8-12 ft puts. You could achieve roughly the same thing by simply blocking out the hole with something else but I find this to be a convenient tool that was worth the $15.
customer_reviews.author: akalavelle

customer_reviews.title: Make Puts
customer_reviews.text: This great practice on the carpet. It’s fun to take it any where. Took on vacation practice in hotel room. Practiced at the beach with some carpet. You will definitely enjoy this.
customer_reviews.author: Mortarhead05

customer_reviews.title: Fun Product
customer_reviews.text: Fun product that is great to just throw down on any carpeted area in your house to practice putting. Yes the opening is smaller than an actual golf hole, but this makes it a fun challenge and should improve overall accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis O

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Really love this training aid, I can use it anywhere and has really helped my game. The double stack is handy for longer putts you can put back and for for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect putting aid
customer_reviews.text: Great for indoor/outdoor/carpet/practice mat....best value for your $$$...Very well made and helps you dial in your putting.
customer_reviews.author: Thorin M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for practice!
customer_reviews.text: Good little practice cup. Well made and heavy. I wish they were white so you could see them like a real golf cup.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Scott

customer_reviews.title: * 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4 year old grandson who loves golf, his dad threatened to steal it. 😊

customer_reviews.title: Very flexible
customer_reviews.text: Better than a putting carpet because you can set it at any length. best on short pile carpet.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to improve your putting
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Can use at home on putting mat or carpet and then take it to the putting green for a bit more challange. Great warm up tool
customer_reviews.author: Kraig R.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for sharpening up your game. I mainly use this inside without the bottom piece and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly winn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my office. Does the trick. I'm putting better.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy, simple and anytime I can use it anywhere in home
customer_reviews.author: Youngsu Chu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect way to get in some practice at the office!
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: As a teaching professional I am sceptical-but this helps me with juniors, I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: Great construction, slips on top of cup, helps identify the high side.
customer_reviews.author: TxRedMan

customer_reviews.title: Material will not scuff/ damage quality putters. Great material. Versatile.
customer_reviews.text: Use this both on n off the course forpractice for accuracy.

customer_reviews.title: Good putting practice aid
customer_reviews.text: Use on my office carpet for indoor practice. Everyone who has tried it likes it.

customer_reviews.title: Great practice tool
customer_reviews.text: Great practice tool. Durable, heavy weighted so it doesn't move.

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable tool to practice with.
customer_reviews.text: Good product to practice putting. Even good to use in the home or office.

customer_reviews.title: Plastic!
customer_reviews.text: Made from plastic. Does not gauge putting speed as similar products that "lip out" if put too long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy putting aid.
customer_reviews.text: Very good putting aid which has helped to improve my practicing and putting.
customer_reviews.author: RonJ

customer_reviews.title: Careless
customer_reviews.text: Product was used and the box taped. For $7 I’ll keep, great for indoor and outdoor. I will not use this company again.

customer_reviews.title: Nice training aid
customer_reviews.text: I like it alot. You can dial it in or out.
customer_reviews.author: B Decent

customer_reviews.title: Great for in the house or on the green
customer_reviews.text: Great for in the house or on the green. I use this every day to practice my 3-10 footers.
customer_reviews.author: Chad D Razwick

customer_reviews.title: Works but needs to be a little heavier it moves ...
customer_reviews.text: Works but needs to be a little heavier it moves when a ball hits the corner or back and the ball does not need to be moving that fast. Even when on carpet it scoots
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Due to weight and texture on bottom, it doesn't move on my Big Moss putting green. Separate the top and bottom, and you have two extra holes. Simple, non-expensive, great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B. Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great putting training aid
customer_reviews.text: This is really great for improving accuracy. It would just like shooting freethrow shots on a smaller basketball hoop. It really helped me with my short putts.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. WhoTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Great Practice Aid
customer_reviews.text: It is a great practice device. It is heavy and substantial. Would buy again.

customer_reviews.text: It is a really great putting aid, I would buy again

customer_reviews.text: Has definitely been a learning tool. My putting game has really come along since using this.

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY CENT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT, GREAT STRESS RELIEVER, TIME KILLER AND FAMILY ACTIVITY!!!

customer_reviews.title: I think it helps I use it on a mat ...
customer_reviews.text: I think it helps I use it on a mat putting green I have for indoor use and it makes you get used to a smaller target which you'd think would help your putting

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it says it is. Great for putting at home or the office
customer_reviews.author: Payton Hall

customer_reviews.title: Helps with Stroke
customer_reviews.text: Gear for putting in my basement while watching TV has really helped improve my stroke. My buddy who is a 3 handicap even asked "what have you been doing? Your stroke is so much better"
customer_reviews.author: ecurrin42

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: It’s a plastic/metal ring that sits on the floor. Golf balls roll into it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I could not wait to try this golf putt pocket. It has really helped me to a putter game, I would recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: RM Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Works on any carpet.
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking for just a plain mat, now. To improve my putting, I look for a level surface and end up having to relocate practice mats to get a straight path. It's easier to do with the SKLZ, and the best way to do it if you're on a surface that doesn't have holes in it. I use a rolled up towel behind it for a back stop for misses.
customer_reviews.author: Buster

product_meta.title: SKLZ Golf Putting Cup Accuracy Trainer
product_meta.description:
Sinking breaking putts is all about visualizing the right line. The Putt Pockets unique horseshoe shape forces players to hit to the high side of the hole, and can be used as an extra practice cup. Features: Helps players improve the accuracy of their line and speed on putts of all lengths. Fits in a standard golf hole, and has a 2.75 inch opening that forces the player to make putts in the high side. Small hole opening makes real holes appear larger once the player is out on the course. Perfect target for practicing at home or office. Can use it as a practice hole (on the turf) on a crowded practice green.

AMAZON.COM
The secret to sinking a breaking putt is to visualize the correct line. Enter the SKLZ Putt Pocket, a putting accuracy trainer with a unique horseshoe shape that forces players to hit the high side of the hole. The trainer--which fits into any standard golf hole, such as those on the putting green--sports a 2.75-inch opening that serves as a target. 



The Putt Pocket forces you to hit the high side of the hole.

The pocket also works as a practice hole in the home or office. When you line up a putt, simply aim for the opening rather than the hole itself. If you see the line accurately, the ball will gravitate to the high side and directly into the cup. Not only will this improve your accuracy and speed, but it will also make real holes appear much larger after a few hours of practice. The Putt Pocket--which also functions as a practice hole for the home or office--is ideal for golfers of all skill levels.  

 About SKLZ
The flagship brand of Pro Performance Sports LLC, SKLZ was built around the popularity of the company's legendary baseball swing trainer, the Hit-A-Way. After starting with a complete line of baseball and softball trainers, the company expanded into football, tennis, soccer, hockey, lacrosse, and most recently, a full spectrum of golf training products. Headquartered in San Diego, the SKLZ team consists of both seasoned professionals and young upstarts in the sporting goods industry who are passionate about delivering the best skill development products to athletes of all ages.
feature_bullets: Shrinks practice cups to promote on-course putting skills
Helps you quickly improve reads, putt speeds and accuracy
Trains you to hit the high side of the hole where more putts get made
Easily fits into your bag for practice at the course or home on mats
